name: Skellywag Adventures (Level Cap Studios, Gabriel Naves)
name_original: Skellywag Adventures (Level Cap Studios, Gabriel Naves)
description:
Music makes you move! Shake those old bones and go about town, letting the sound move you, quite literally.

In this plataformer game you can only move, and the music decide your other actions Jumping, attacking, dashing, (and even dancing) is controlled by the instruments in the music. Pay close atention to the tempo of the music and use them to time your actions.

How to Play

  •  Use the arrow keys to move
  • The music will make you do other moves (jump, attack, dash and dance); Show by the icons

Created by:

  • Eber Filipe - Music and sound effects
  • Gabriel Naves - Coding
  • Lucas Caldeira - Artwork
  • Rodrigo Maia - Artwork
